page.title: 03SCHOOL.
page.content:
Forden school was built in 1847.There are three classes and a dinner room, kitchen and 4 cloakrooms; a school house, 2 pianos and other musical instruments. We have 3 teachers,2 cooks,2 supervisors. Miss Hughes teaches Welsh and Mrs Jones helps some children with reading. A special art teacher called Mr Hughes comes in every Friday morning. There are 23 infants, 21 middle class and 17 top class.There are 61 children altogether in school.
We have a music teacher called Mrs Evans and a violin teacher called Mrs Jones. Our three teachers are called Mrs Dixon, the infants teacher, Mr Baker, the middle class teacher and Mr Brignell, the top class teacher. School starts at 9am and finishes at 3.30pm.
